text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
I'll be helping around the kitchen and back room. 
If you need anything just let me know. Right then, it's all yours.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Thank you! 
……? What's with the smile, Ines?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you know! 
You're always holding back so much.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Seeing you have fun makes me want to work harder too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… You're too kind, Ines.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Don't be silly. I'm just helping my roommate. 
Look, our first customer's here!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
One caffè mocha and cappuccino, one berry crepe 
and chestnut cream cheesecake, do I have that right?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
A Kilimanjaro with honey toast. 
Oh, and Mandheling!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(You can tell Ines is used to this. Marvelous and Biko are 
both going at it with confidence as well…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (… A concept. Ours is "SweeTea's café". I'm to be its Master… Then I have to—)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (… Your sighs won't slip past me! A Master is someone the customers can turn to! Which means I have to—)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … Love got you feeling down, madam?

text_block_list.name: Café Customer
text_block_list.text: Huh?! H-How did you know…?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Do forgive me. A sigh caught my attention… 
If you don't mind, perhaps I can lend an ear?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to serve as your filter, to remove the 
tanginess and leave your heart a clean brew.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Whaaaaa!? Hang on now! Where did I get all of that from!! Master wouldn't talk in such a pompous way!)

text_block_list.name: Café Customer
text_block_list.text: Umm……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes?! Love troubles, madam?!

text_block_list.name: Café Customer
text_block_list.text: …… Huh? No, I was hoping for the bill……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
……… Aaaaaa～ 
… Just a moment please!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (And so, the first day passed in the blink of an eye…)

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Marvelooouus☆★ We had a good day! 
Everyone who came was smiling☆

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. We had no problems, and a great atmosphere all the way! 
The owner said sales were good, too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, today really went well thanks to your help…… 
But…… I need to… Hmmm…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: If I want to be like SweeTea's Master I have to be better at conversing with customers…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Keep your head up, girl. This was only our 
first day, you know? You'll grow into it!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
Look sharp, everyone. 
Work isn't over yet!

text_block_list.name: Café Owner
text_block_list.text:
You have a little more to do before you can take a break! 
Off you go, there are things to be bought for the next opening!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Lemon, chocolate, whipped cream… 
Alright, that's it! So…!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
… Hey! I saw Carrot Man's new card on sale! 
I brought my allowance, so—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Huhuhumph… Hold on, Biko. And rejoice! 
The owner entrusted me with an allowance called wage!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: …! Really?! Wooaaaah…!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
… You know, Ryan, if you were as straightforward maybe 
you'd have an easier time talking to customers.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
A-Ahaha…… straightforward… 
………

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (――A white flower. What a beautiful hair ornament.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: … Do you want that one?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ehh?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Well, the store's right there so let's stop by. 
Hey, girls!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa whoah. Ines!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, Ryan was looking at this? 
It looks soft and frilly and positively Marvelous☆

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Right!? Go on, Ryan. For your hard work today? 
You need a little reward♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: R-reward? This is too cute of a…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
But it caught your eye, right? 
If you like it, why not just buy it?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, Biko's right! 
Like I just said, if you can be more open about—

text_block_list.name: Customer in Shop A
text_block_list.text:
H-Hey? Isn't that a daughter of the Mejiro family! 
You know, the one in the same year as McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Customer in Shop B
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh, yeah, that cool girl, right? 
If I remember, her—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
E-excuse me! Let's get going, everyone. 
We still have Biko's shopping to do.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ? Huh? But we can just do that after this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm fine, I'm fine! It's too cute for me anyway. 
That kind of thing doesn't suit me at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (―After all, having been by her side, I know.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(… Such "love", such "cuteness"… 
are not things meant for someone like me.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
… Okay. Well, let's go then. 
Sorry about that.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ……? Huh? …Huh? Why are you two…?
